title: Philadelphia This Time, Supreme Court Election Sabotage 10.28.20
itunes:title: Philadelphia This Time, Supreme Court Election Sabotage 10.28.20
description:
In episode 745, Jack and Miles are joined by district commissioner, rapper and Waiting On Reparations co-host Mariah Parker aka Linqua Franqa to discuss the murder of Walter Wallace Jr., if Bloomberg is spending money, Republicans screwing over voters, Trump urging voters to change their vote, Heinz Tomato Blood ketchup, Putin shading Trump, Joe Biden's merch, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Protests in Philadelphia After Police Fatally Shoot Black Man
  2. AJC poll shows deadlocked races for president, Senate seats in Georgia
  3. The latest on the 2020 election
  4. Donald Trump still leads in Texas, according to the final Times/Siena poll of the state, as strength among nonwhite voters does just enough to overcome all out rebellion in the suburbs - Trump 47, Biden 43
  5. In Wisconsin decision, Supreme Court foreshadows election night cliffhanger
  6. Fox & Friends Sees Hope For a Trump Win in People Searching ‘Can I Change My Vote’ on Google
  7. Can I Change My Vote? Trump Tweets 'Go Do it' as Google Searches Spike
  8. What happens if I vote by mail and want to change my ballot at a later date? 
  9. Heinz is giving away Tomato Blood ketchup via TikTok
  10. Putin rejects Donald Trump's criticism of Biden family business
  11. Trump Keeps Saying Biden Got $3.5 Million From Putin. Here's The Truth.
  12. The Biden campaign started selling fly swatters right after the debate. They've already sold out
  13. Biden is selling hand sanitizer with his Covid-19 plan printed on it.
  14. An inside look at how Biden's campaign is winning the viral merch game
  15. WATCH: Vex Ruffin - Mabuhay Boy

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
